page: CY61022: Synthesis And Processing Of Ceramics

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite : NilClassification of ceramics and materials: crystal structures and properties. Elementary ceramic phase diagrams. Ceramic powder preparation from naturally occurring raw materials. Synthesis of ceramic powders, fabrication of ceramic bodies from powders: pressing, casting, vapour phase techniques, sintering, finishing, machining. Ceramic coatings
page: CY61022: Synthesis And Processing Of Ceramics
